predicate.note: Frames file for 'suffocate' based on sentences in brown.

roleset.name: (cause to) not be able to breathe

role.descr: instrument, if cause also present as arg0

example.name: nominal with all args
example.text: Like Eliot, in my fantasies, I had a proud bearing and, with a skill that was vaguely continental, I would lead Jessica through an evening of dancing and handsome descriptions of my newest exploits, would guide her gently to the night's climax which, in my dreams, was always represented by our almost suffocating one another to death with deep, moist kisses burning with love.
example.arg: with deep, moist kisses burning with love

example.name: verbal
example.text: [It]-1 crawled across her breasts, [*-1] suffocating the life in her nipples.
